description:
*** Over 1000 satisfied students have enrolled in my course in just one week! ***

Before you read what I have to say, see what my students are saying about this course:

1 word - AMAZING!!! If your looking for 2nd rate unpolished half-hearted Twitter marketing secrets this course is not for you. However, if you want to truly tap into the power of Twitter overnight and empower your results than this is more than worth your nickel. First day I grew by over 500 targeted followers largely because of principals brought forward in this presentation. What I want to know after this is what other courses he has because this is hot and I expect those will be too.
- Guy Siverson

I'm a Filmmaker who needs help!!!... I"m so bad in social media, but Alex Ferrari with his original way to explain the things that are hard to understand make it so easy to get it... This course is working the first hours I implemented... I recommend it very much. - Hector Pasillas

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Are you not getting the results you want from Twitter? Haven't cracked the Tweet code yet?Are you ready to take your Twitter game up to a whole new level? Then is the course for you.

Twitter Hacks is my up to date method on how I generated over 10,000 Followers (True Fans) in 10 weeks.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You'll learn NEW SKILLS that they don't teach you on YouTube. The "secret sauce" I use is a gold mine. I'll teach you how to find, engage and eventually monetize true fans of your brand, website or product.

This is a LIVING COURSE, I'll be adding and updating it often!

As the founder of the popular filmmaking blog, Indie Film Hustle, I knew I had to learn how to crack the Twitter code so I could generate traffic to my site.

I now share my proven techniques with you.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Here's what you will learn from Twitter Hacks:

  • What are True Fans?
  • The 1000 True Fan Theory
  • Social Media Etiquette
  • The Temptation of the dark side (buying followers)
  • Optimizing Your Twitter Account
  • When Should I Tweet?
  • What do I Tweet? - Creating Engaging Content for Twitter
  • 80/20 Principle on Content
  • Optimal Sizes for All Images for Twitter
  • #hashtag for follower explosion
  • How to Schedule Your Posts
  • Automating Your Tweets
  • My Secret Sauce on How I got 10,000 Followers in 10 Weeks

...and much more.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Important information before you enroll:

  • In case you find the course useless, don't forget you are covered by a 30 day money back guarantee, full refund, no questions asked!
  • Once enrolled, you have unlimited, lifetime access to the course!
  • You will have instant and free access to any updates I'll add to the course.
  • I will give you my full support regarding any issues or suggestions related to the course.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Enroll NOW and turn your Twitter account into a traffic generating, brand building and money making machine! Let's get started!
title: Social Media Hacks: Get 10,000 True Twitter Fans in 2 Months
